title: Critical national infrastructure and mergers regime reform

details.body:
The UK follows an economic model that thrives on openness to trade. This has served the country well over the years. But such a model can only be effective if it comes with safeguards.

The paper asks for views on the proposals to:

  • reform how the Government scrutinises overseas investments in the UKâ€™s critical national infrastructure for national security purposes; and
  • introduce greater transparency into the mergers process.

We will use responses to develop the proposals further.

description: We are seeking views on how best to consider potential national security risks when scrutinising overseas investment into critical national infrastructure.
